title: Super Thrift
description: Super Thrift tells the story of a girl who doesn't want to get a used bike from the thrift store. But after realizing how many cool and unique things she could find at the thrift store, she changes her attitude and falls in love with her bike. Detailed illustrations and high-frequency words support emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events as well as to identify and use the pronoun she in sentences.
